data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today has approved the following:

1. Re-designation of Mr. Priyansh Kapoor - Whole-time Director & CEO as "Managing Director & CEO"; 

2. Request received from Mr. Kamal Singal vide his letter dated 10-02-2026 conveying his intention to step down from position of MD & CEO and accordingly he ceases to be MD & CEO; and 

3. Re-designation of Mr. Kamal Singal as "Whole-time Director - Strategy and Investments.

data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Company has on 15-07-2025 received no objection letters from BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India Limited regarding re-classification of Mr. Samvegbhai Arvindbhai Lalbhai from "Promoter Group" category to "Public" category.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: With reference to our earlier intimation dated 02-05-2025 regarding intimation of Mr. Mitanshu Shah CFO & KMP of the Company wherein his relieving date was not decided. In this regard we hereby inform you that today i.e. 31-05-2025 is mutually decided as the last working day /relieving date of CFO & KMP. Accordingly after close of business hours of 31-05-2025 Mr. Mitanshu Shah would cease to be CFO & KMP of the Company.
